sections.heading: Reference to Circuit Court deemed to mean Court of Common Pleas

sections.heading: to 51-146. - Constitution of Court of Common Pleas; senior judges, terms, powers
sections.text: Annual meeting of judges; meeting with judges of Superior Court. Special meetings of judges. Substitute judges. Clerks and clerical staff.

sections.heading: to 51-156. - Civil business at criminal terms

sections.heading: to 51-160. - Family relations matters transferred from Superior Court: Terms and sessions for hearing; power of court or judge
sections.text: Adjournment of court. Rooms for special sessions. Place of trial need not be designated.

sections.heading: to 51-164. - Files and judgments of court held in Stamford to be recorded and preserved in Stamford
